author: Scott Polacek
title: Ex-NFL TE Mark Campbell on Coronavirus Hospitalization: 'It Kicked My Ass'
description: Former  NFL  tight end Mark Campbell detailed his experience having COVID-19 in a lengthy interview with    Dave Birkett    of the  Detroit Free Press  (h/t  USA Today )...
content:
Tom Berg/Getty Images
Former NFL tight end Mark Campbell detailed his experience having COVID-19 in a lengthy interview with Dave Birkett of the Detroit Free Press (h/t USA Today).
